patthana16.75:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.75:2.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:4.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.75:5.1_0: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
